column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here on a Thursday night with a reservation for 6pm. When my friend and I arrived
column2: the host led us through a winding path around the restaurant
column3: when we finally got to our seats. The point I'm trying to make is
column4: this restaurant is huge! But it was fairly empty when we got there--probably cause it was a Thursday night.
